title: Pil, Iran
text: Pil (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Pīl; also known as Pel) is a village in <a href="Owzrud%20Rural%20District">Owzrud Rural District</a>, <a href="Baladeh%20District">Baladeh District</a>, <a href="Nur%20County">Nur County</a>, <a href="Mazandaran%20Province">Mazandaran Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. In 2006, its population was 53 people in 23 families.
